file_content.text: The escape pods aren't far, now. You can make it on your own, General.
And what about you?
I will face my destiny. Go now, my friend.
Halt where you are. I am Yadira Ban, Padawan of the Jedi Order. I was sent to protect the general, and you will not pass.
Isn't "Padawan" just another word for "apprentice"? You're not even a real Jedi.
You're nothing.
I will be. I've assembled my lightsaber. My final trial is to face a Sith in combat.
Your Master sent you? Really. My first teacher tried to kill me, too.
Surely you're joking.
Then it's true. You Sith are a mockery of everything the Jedi believe in.
I was sent here to take your general. I think one of us will be disappointed.
That's too bad for you.
Yes. I expect you're right about that.
Let's see how Jedi spookiness holds up against a blaster.
Ooh. Scary.
Surrender. Give me what I want, and your ship can survive.
Put down your weapons.
I cannot accept that. A Jedi does not surrender the innocent into the hands of evil.
But I intend to drive you back--meter by meter, if need be. Just as the Republic pushed the Sith Empire into the dark of the galaxy.
In case you hadn't noticed, the Empire is back--and we'll destroy you.
You're beaten already.
You cannot destroy us--no more than a shadow can destroy he who casts it.
Makes no difference to me. You're keeping me from my target.
Yeah, whatever.
I hope one day you'll see beyond your selfish desires. But I cannot be the one to teach you.
Then there's no way we can settle this peacefully?
Can't we talk?
No. Not anymore, I fear.
I'm hardly frightened.
I don't need to scare you, only defeat you. And that, I can do.
Die. Now. [Attack]
I will not fall to one such as you. I will not!
You aren't going to win this. I swear it.
You may run, or you may stand your ground. But you'll go no farther.
You've already spoken to my Master aboard your ship. You know he's coming with reinforcements. I need only hold you off.
